title: Ferreira ( Nicolau)
body: In some churches of this diocese, there are several canvases with the signature of the painter Nicolau Ferreira, from whom we could not obtain any information. We have reason to believe that these paintings were executed on this island and date from the end of the 17th century.

SÃ©culo XVII: Execution of the canvases with the signature of the painter Nicolau Ferreira
